summary: Three estranged childhood friends (Omar, Ramy, Jay), travel on a road trip from Abu Dhabi to Beirut in memory of their lost friend. If what happens en route doesn't make them crazy, it might just bring them closer.
cast: Fahad Albutairi|Shadi Alfons|Fadi Rifaai|Kal Naga|Samer al Masri|Wonho Chung|Leem Lubany|Maha Abou Ouf|Yousra El Lozy|Abdulmohsen Alnemr|Ali Suliman|Madeline Zima|Ahd|Christina Wolfe|Ibraheem Alkhairallah|Ibrahim Mursi|Hisham Fageeh|Iman Al Shaybani|Seif Abol Naga|Nawaf Al-Janahi|Ibrahim Khairallah|Mina Kici Khattar|Mohammed Mostafa|Gino Vassallo|Khaled Zaazouh
title: From A to B
